title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-3.3 - Report of refused insurance, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-3.3 - Report of refused insurance, etc

State Regulations

If insurance is refused, canceled or discontinued for any
boiler as to which no inspection report is required at the time, the action
shall be promptly reported to the commissioner or to the inspecting agency of
the city as may be appropriate, stating the reason therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
